title: Investing in Bubbly
description: Cult Wines CEO Tom Gearing, and Atul Tiwari, CEO, Americas, of the London-based investment firm, talk about Champagne’s rising star as an investment asset and as a sparkly holiday drink with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Cult Wines CEO Tom Gearing, and Atul Tiwari, CEO, Americas, of the London-based investment firm, talk about Champagne’s rising star as an investment asset and as a sparkly holiday drink with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz.
